titleStmt.title: The well-tuned organ, or, An exercitation wherein this question is fully and largely discussed, whether or no instrumental and organickal musick be lawful in holy publick assemblies : which query made good in the affirmativ by by the blessing of God upon the industry of Joseph Brookbank ...
titleStmt.author: Brookbank, Joseph, b. 1612.
